item.title: Where to add the break command :/ STILL UNSOLVED PLEASE COME HERE
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“strd3stroyer, post:13, topic:417296”]Try this, I looked in it and it seemed you had one too many }
I took that out and added in the break;
see if it works please

[code]public boolean smithing() {
if (IsItemInBag(2347) == true) {
int bars = 0;
int Length = 22;
int barid = 0;
int Level = 0;
int ItemN = 1;

                    if (smithing[2] >= 4) {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] + 1) * 2));
                    } else {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] - 1) * 2));
                    }
                    if ((smithing[2] == 1) || (smithing[2] == 2)) {
                            Length += 1;
                    } else if (smithing[2] == 3) {
                            Length += 2;
                    }
                    for (int i = 0; i < Length; i++) {
                            if (Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][0] == smithing[4]) {
                                    bars = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][3];
                                    if (smithing[1] == 0) {
                                            smithing[1] = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][2];
                                    }
                                    ItemN = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][1];
                            }
                    }
                    if (playerLevel[playerSmithing] >= smithing[1]) {
                            if (AreXItemsInBag(barid, bars) == true) {
                                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 1)) {
                                                    actionAmount++;
                                                    /*
                                                     * OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 2347; // Hammer
                                                     * OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
                                                     */
                                                    sM("You start hammering the bar...");
                                                    
                                                    setAnimation(0x382);
                                                    smithing[0] = 2;
                                            }
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 2)) {
                                                    for (int i = 0; i < bars; i++) {
                                                            deleteItem(barid, GetItemSlot(barid),
                                                                            playerItemsN[GetItemSlot(barid)]);
                                                    }
                                                    addSkillXP(
                                                                    ((int) (150.5 * bars * smithing[2] * smithing[3])),
                                                                    playerSmithing);
                                                    addItem(smithing[4], ItemN);
                                                    sM("You smith a "
                                                                    + getItemName(smithing[4]) + ".");
                                                    resetAnimation();
                                                    if (smithing[5] <= 1) {
                                                            resetSM();
                                                    } else {
                                    
                                                            smithing[5] -= 1;
                                                            smithing[0] = 1;
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    } else {
                                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                                            resetSM();
                                            return false;
                                    }
                            } else {
                                    sM("You need " + bars + " " + getItemName(barid)
                                                    + " to smith a " + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                                    resetAnimation();
                                    resetSM();
                            }
                    } else {
                            sM("You need " + smithing[1] + " "
                                            + statName[playerSmithing] + " to smith a "
                                            + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                            resetSM();
                            return false;
                    }
            } else {
                    sM("You need a " + getItemName(2347) + " to hammer bars.");
                    resetSM();
                    return false;
            }
            return true;
    }

break;[/code][/quote]
no it’s still giving me that same error but thanks and for that extra { im sorry it was a typo :> all fixed

Read full topic

item.title: Where to add the break command :/ STILL UNSOLVED PLEASE COME HERE
item.dc:creator: @strd3stroyer strd3stroyer
item.description:
@strd3stroyer wrote:

Try this, I looked in it and it seemed you had one too many }
I took that out and added in the break;
see if it works please

[code]public boolean smithing() {
if (IsItemInBag(2347) == true) {
int bars = 0;
int Length = 22;
int barid = 0;
int Level = 0;
int ItemN = 1;

                    if (smithing[2] >= 4) {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] + 1) * 2));
                    } else {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] - 1) * 2));
                    }
                    if ((smithing[2] == 1) || (smithing[2] == 2)) {
                            Length += 1;
                    } else if (smithing[2] == 3) {
                            Length += 2;
                    }
                    for (int i = 0; i < Length; i++) {
                            if (Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][0] == smithing[4]) {
                                    bars = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][3];
                                    if (smithing[1] == 0) {
                                            smithing[1] = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][2];
                                    }
                                    ItemN = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][1];
                            }
                    }
                    if (playerLevel[playerSmithing] >= smithing[1]) {
                            if (AreXItemsInBag(barid, bars) == true) {
                                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 1)) {
                                                    actionAmount++;
                                                    /*
                                                     * OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 2347; // Hammer
                                                     * OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
                                                     */
                                                    sM("You start hammering the bar...");
                                                    
                                                    setAnimation(0x382);
                                                    smithing[0] = 2;
                                            }
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 2)) {
                                                    for (int i = 0; i < bars; i++) {
                                                            deleteItem(barid, GetItemSlot(barid),
                                                                            playerItemsN[GetItemSlot(barid)]);
                                                    }
                                                    addSkillXP(
                                                                    ((int) (150.5 * bars * smithing[2] * smithing[3])),
                                                                    playerSmithing);
                                                    addItem(smithing[4], ItemN);
                                                    sM("You smith a "
                                                                    + getItemName(smithing[4]) + ".");
                                                    resetAnimation();
                                                    if (smithing[5] <= 1) {
                                                            resetSM();
                                                    } else {
                                    
                                                            smithing[5] -= 1;
                                                            smithing[0] = 1;
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    } else {
                                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                                            resetSM();
                                            return false;
                                    }
                            } else {
                                    sM("You need " + bars + " " + getItemName(barid)
                                                    + " to smith a " + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                                    resetAnimation();
                                    resetSM();
                            }
                    } else {
                            sM("You need " + smithing[1] + " "
                                            + statName[playerSmithing] + " to smith a "
                                            + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                            resetSM();
                            return false;
                    }
            } else {
                    sM("You need a " + getItemName(2347) + " to hammer bars.");
                    resetSM();
                    return false;
            }
            return true;
    }

break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“youridudock, post:8, topic:417296”][quote author=own master link=topic=519851.msg3774639#msg3774639 date=1317996639]

at the end of the code, add it.

what code?
[/quote]

Lmao, Ur code ofcouse.[/quote] do you mean like this?

[code=java]public boolean smithing() {
if (IsItemInBag(2347) == true) {
int bars = 0;
int Length = 22;
int barid = 0;
int Level = 0;
int ItemN = 1;

                    if (smithing[2] >= 4) {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] + 1) * 2));
                    } else {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] - 1) * 2));
                    }
                    if ((smithing[2] == 1) || (smithing[2] == 2)) {
                            Length += 1;
                    } else if (smithing[2] == 3) {
                            Length += 2;
                    }
                    for (int i = 0; i < Length; i++) {
                            if (Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][0] == smithing[4]) {
                                    bars = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][3];
                                    if (smithing[1] == 0) {
                                            smithing[1] = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][2];
                                    }
                                    ItemN = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][1];
                            }
                    }
                    if (playerLevel[playerSmithing] >= smithing[1]) {
                            if (AreXItemsInBag(barid, bars) == true) {
                                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 1)) {
                                                    actionAmount++;
                                                    /*
                                                     * OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 2347; // Hammer
                                                     * OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
                                                     */
                                                    sM("You start hammering the bar...");
                                                    
                                                    setAnimation(0x382);
                                                    smithing[0] = 2;
                                            }
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 2)) {
                                                    for (int i = 0; i < bars; i++) {
                                                            deleteItem(barid, GetItemSlot(barid),
                                                                            playerItemsN[GetItemSlot(barid)]);
                                                    }
                                                    addSkillXP(
                                                                    ((int) (150.5 * bars * smithing[2] * smithing[3])),
                                                                    playerSmithing);
                                                    addItem(smithing[4], ItemN);
                                                    sM("You smith a "
                                                                    + getItemName(smithing[4]) + ".");
                                                    resetAnimation();
                                                    if (smithing[5] <= 1) {
                                                            resetSM();
                                                    } else {
                                    
                                                            smithing[5] -= 1;
                                                            smithing[0] = 1;
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    } else {
                                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                                            resetSM();
                                            return false;
                                    }
                            } else {
                                    sM("You need " + bars + " " + getItemName(barid)
                                                    + " to smith a " + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                                    resetAnimation();
                                    resetSM();
                            }
                    } else {
                            sM("You need " + smithing[1] + " "
                                            + statName[playerSmithing] + " to smith a "
                                            + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                            resetSM();
                            return false;
                    }
            } else {
                    sM("You need a " + getItemName(2347) + " to hammer bars.");
                    resetSM();
                    return false;

            }

            return true;
    }

break;[/code]
?? if you do its not working for me its giving me this error:

client.java:726: error: illegal start of type break; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

codyskate5021:

where do i add it exactly and what do i add with it or do i add nothing

[code=java]public boolean smithing() {
if (IsItemInBag(2347) == true) {
int bars = 0;
int Length = 22;
int barid = 0;
int Level = 0;
int ItemN = 1;

                    if (smithing[2] >= 4) {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] + 1) * 2));
                    } else {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] - 1) * 2));
                    }
                    if ((smithing[2] == 1) || (smithing[2] == 2)) {
                            Length += 1;
                    } else if (smithing[2] == 3) {
                            Length += 2;
                    }
                    for (int i = 0; i < Length; i++) {
                            if (Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][0] == smithing[4]) {
                                    bars = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][3];
                                    if (smithing[1] == 0) {
                                            smithing[1] = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][2];
                                    }
                                    ItemN = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][1];
                            }
                    }
                    if (playerLevel[playerSmithing] >= smithing[1]) {
                            if (AreXItemsInBag(barid, bars) == true) {
                                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 1)) {
                                                    actionAmount++;
                                                    /*
                                                     * OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 2347; // Hammer
                                                     * OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
                                                     */
                                                    sM("You start hammering the bar...");
                                                    
                                                    setAnimation(0x382);
                                                    smithing[0] = 2;
                                            }
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 2)) {
                                                    for (int i = 0; i < bars; i++) {
                                                            deleteItem(barid, GetItemSlot(barid),
                                                                            playerItemsN[GetItemSlot(barid)]);
                                                    }
                                                    addSkillXP(
                                                                    ((int) (150.5 * bars * smithing[2] * smithing[3])),
                                                                    playerSmithing);
                                                    addItem(smithing[4], ItemN);
                                                    sM("You smith a "
                                                                    + getItemName(smithing[4]) + ".");
                                                    resetAnimation();
                                                    if (smithing[5] <= 1) {
                                                            resetSM();
                                                    } else {
                                    
                                                            smithing[5] -= 1;
                                                            smithing[0] = 1;
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    } else {
                                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                                            resetSM();
                                            return false;
                                    }
                            } else {
                                    sM("You need " + bars + " " + getItemName(barid)
                                                    + " to smith a " + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                                    resetAnimation();
                                    resetSM();
                            }
                    } else {
                            sM("You need " + smithing[1] + " "
                                            + statName[playerSmithing] + " to smith a "
                                            + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                            resetSM();
                            return false;
                    }
            } else {
                    sM("You need a " + getItemName(2347) + " to hammer bars.");
                    resetSM();
                    return false;
            }
            return true;
    }

    }

break;[/code]

where do i add it exactly and what do i add with it or do i add nothing
[/quote]

[code=java]public boolean smithing() {
if (IsItemInBag(2347) == true) {
int bars = 0;
int Length = 22;
int barid = 0;
int Level = 0;
int ItemN = 1;

                    if (smithing[2] >= 4) {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] + 1) * 2));
                    } else {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] - 1) * 2));
                    }
                    if ((smithing[2] == 1) || (smithing[2] == 2)) {
                            Length += 1;
                    } else if (smithing[2] == 3) {
                            Length += 2;
                    }
                    for (int i = 0; i < Length; i++) {
                            if (Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][0] == smithing[4]) {
                                    bars = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][3];
                                    if (smithing[1] == 0) {
                                            smithing[1] = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][2];
                                    }
                                    ItemN = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][1];
                            }
                    }
                    if (playerLevel[playerSmithing] >= smithing[1]) {
                            if (AreXItemsInBag(barid, bars) == true) {
                                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 1)) {
                                                    actionAmount++;
                                                    /*
                                                     * OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 2347; // Hammer
                                                     * OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
                                                     */
                                                    sM("You start hammering the bar...");
                                                    
                                                    setAnimation(0x382);
                                                    smithing[0] = 2;
                                            }
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 2)) {
                                                    for (int i = 0; i < bars; i++) {
                                                            deleteItem(barid, GetItemSlot(barid),
                                                                            playerItemsN[GetItemSlot(barid)]);
                                                    }
                                                    addSkillXP(
                                                                    ((int) (150.5 * bars * smithing[2] * smithing[3])),
                                                                    playerSmithing);
                                                    addItem(smithing[4], ItemN);
                                                    sM("You smith a "
                                                                    + getItemName(smithing[4]) + ".");
                                                    resetAnimation();
                                                    if (smithing[5] <= 1) {
                                                            resetSM();
                                                    } else {
                                    
                                                            smithing[5] -= 1;
                                                            smithing[0] = 1;
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    } else {
                                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                                            resetSM();
                                            return false;
                                    }
                            } else {
                                    sM("You need " + bars + " " + getItemName(barid)
                                                    + " to smith a " + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                                    resetAnimation();
                                    resetSM();
                            }
                    } else {
                            sM("You need " + smithing[1] + " "
                                            + statName[playerSmithing] + " to smith a "
                                            + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                            resetSM();
                            return false;
                    }
            } else {
                    sM("You need a " + getItemName(2347) + " to hammer bars.");
                    resetSM();
                    return false;
            }
            return true;
    }

    }

break;[/code]

i believe thats it i am not the best at this… by far… if not ill open my server and take a look.

item.title: Where to add the break command :/ STILL UNSOLVED PLEASE COME HERE
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

hey guys I’m almost done with adding smithing to my server i just need to add this “break;” under this statement:

[code=java]public boolean smithing() {
if (IsItemInBag(2347) == true) {
int bars = 0;
int Length = 22;
int barid = 0;
int Level = 0;
int ItemN = 1;

                    if (smithing[2] >= 4) {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] + 1) * 2));
                    } else {
                            barid = (2349 + ((smithing[2] - 1) * 2));
                    }
                    if ((smithing[2] == 1) || (smithing[2] == 2)) {
                            Length += 1;
                    } else if (smithing[2] == 3) {
                            Length += 2;
                    }
                    for (int i = 0; i < Length; i++) {
                            if (Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][0] == smithing[4]) {
                                    bars = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][3];
                                    if (smithing[1] == 0) {
                                            smithing[1] = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][2];
                                    }
                                    ItemN = Item.smithing_frame[(smithing[2] - 1)][i][1];
                            }
                    }
                    if (playerLevel[playerSmithing] >= smithing[1]) {
                            if (AreXItemsInBag(barid, bars) == true) {
                                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 1)) {
                                                    actionAmount++;
                                                    /*
                                                     * OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 2347; // Hammer
                                                     * OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
                                                     * playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
                                                     */
                                                    sM("You start hammering the bar...");
                                                    
                                                    setAnimation(0x382);
                                                    smithing[0] = 2;
                                            }
                                            if ((smithing[0] == 2)) {
                                                    for (int i = 0; i < bars; i++) {
                                                            deleteItem(barid, GetItemSlot(barid),
                                                                            playerItemsN[GetItemSlot(barid)]);
                                                    }
                                                    addSkillXP(
                                                                    ((int) (150.5 * bars * smithing[2] * smithing[3])),
                                                                    playerSmithing);
                                                    addItem(smithing[4], ItemN);
                                                    sM("You smith a "
                                                                    + getItemName(smithing[4]) + ".");
                                                    resetAnimation();
                                                    if (smithing[5] <= 1) {
                                                            resetSM();
                                                    } else {
                                    
                                                            smithing[5] -= 1;
                                                            smithing[0] = 1;
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    } else {
                                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                                            resetSM();
                                            return false;
                                    }
                            } else {
                                    sM("You need " + bars + " " + getItemName(barid)
                                                    + " to smith a " + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                                    resetAnimation();
                                    resetSM();
                            }
                    } else {
                            sM("You need " + smithing[1] + " "
                                            + statName[playerSmithing] + " to smith a "
                                            + getItemName(smithing[4]));
                            resetSM();
                            return false;
                    }
            } else {
                    sM("You need a " + getItemName(2347) + " to hammer bars.");
                    resetSM();
                    return false;
            }
            return true;
    }

[/code]
where do i add it exactly and what do i add with it or do i add nothing
